price: 85. Markuu ku yidhi aabbihi iyo dadkiisii: Waa maxay waxaad caabudaysaan?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
